text: The Keg () is a Canadian steakhouse chain of restaurants. It has restaurants in both Canada and the United States. It was started by George Tidball in North Vancouver, British Columbia in 1971. The chain is currently owned by David Aisenstat and is operating in every province in Canada except Prince Edward Island. It is also operating in Phoenix, Tucson, Dallas/Fort Worth, Denver, and Seattle. == References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Canadian restaurants Category:Companies listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange Category:1971 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Vancouver
title: The Keg
